short_summary: The National Research Council Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of an outdoor prefabricated hazardous chemical waste storage building.
description: The National Research Council Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of an outdoor prefabricated hazardous chemical waste storage building to safely store various hazardous waste materials produced as a result of research laboratory activities temporarily.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

* **Title (English)**: Prefabricated Outdoor Hazardous Chemical Storage Unit
* **Title (French)**: Unité d’entreposage extérieure préfabriquée pour produits darnéreux
* **Reference Number**: cb-505-64736161
* **Amendment/Solicitation Number**: 24-58051 (Amendment #8)
* **Publication Date**: June 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: July 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: July 8, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start/End Date**: July 10, 2024, to January 31, 2025
* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré

**Procurement Category and Description**
* **Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Category Description**: National Research Council Canada is seeking a supplier for a prefabricated outdoor hazardous storage unit.

**Trade Agreements and Compliance**

* **Trade Agreements**: Manufacturer must adhere to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Compliance**: Compliance with all applicable laws and regulations

**Contracting Entity Information**
* **Contracting Entity Name**: National Research Council of Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa ON K1A 0R6, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Carol Mary Cooper; [carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca); 902-425-4353

**Notice and Attachments**

* **Notice URL**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
* **Attachments**:
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/39620/24-58051\_qa3.pdf
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/39620/24-58051\_rfp\_outdoor-storage-facility\_final.pdf
	+ several other attachments can be found on the above website

**Proposal Evaluation Criteria**

The National Research Council Canada will evaluate proposals based on the price, and the lowest priced proposal will be awarded.
